name: Lonely Smoke And Squishy Doors
description:
This game was made in 3h 50min by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) for Trijam #114

The theme was: "Smoke without fire"

Use WAD to move and R to restart a level (shouldn't be needed).

All sounds will probably sound bad if you are using Chrome.

Made with Godot Engine

Premade assets: one character controller

All sound effects downloaded from freesound.org
